title: [Once a caregiver, always a caregiver]./ Soignant un jour, soignant toujours
abstract: March 2020, COVID-19 pandemic. In France, a state of health emergency is declared by the authorities; training managers are called in as reinforcements. This return to the field in the context of a health crisis has made it possible to re-examine practices and the place of the manager within the health system.
authors: Bourgeois, Alexandra; Carre, Isabelle; Hamel, Christelle; Lecland, Patricia
